What's New in DockFlow 1.57

Major New Feature

  • Advanced Hotkeys System – DockFlow now supports more complex hotkey configurations for switching between presets, giving you greater flexibility in your workflow.
  • Leader Key Mode – Set a leader key to enter DockFlow hotkeys mode, simplifying how you switch between presets with intuitive key sequences.
  • Double and Triple Key Combinations – Use double-tap and triple-tap key combinations for switching between presets, providing additional shortcut options.
  • Advanced Configuration – Fine-tune your hotkey experience with configurable listening window timing and more customization options.

Visual Updates

  • Christmas Theme – Celebrate the holiday season with a festive Christmas theme for DockFlow.

Bug Fixes

  • UI Improvements – Fixed various user interface bugs for a smoother experience.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!
